snippet.title: Super Indie Karts x Runbow = Runbow Road
snippet.description:
Take up the challenge of Runbow Road! When the colour of the sky changes (which is every 6 seconds), the same colour on the track becomes a dangerous hole to avoid!

Super Indie Karts is a '90s style kart racer available in Early Access on Steam (for Windows and Mac) and OUYA featuring racetrack and kart crossovers with a heap of super Indie Games. http://store.steampowered.com/app/323670/

Runbow is a fast paced multiplayer runathon from 13AM Games available for the Wii-U now. You can find more info from http://www.13amgames.com/
